amendment.description: Amendment sought to close the loophole that prevents aggregating emissions from any oil or gas exploration or production well. Additionally, it sought to require the EPA to add hydrogen sulfide to the list of hazardous air pollutants.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 186 - 242 (Roll no. 388).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 186 - 242 (Roll no. 388).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Polis.
